目前已经被曝光的造假手段：1、用马克笔让选民涂选票，选票作废。2、选举站工作人员把投特朗普的选票拿出...


1、用马克笔让选民涂选票，选票作废。
FC: sharpie笔也会被机器识别
https://twitter.com/MaricopaVote/status/1323728961231233025
https://www.factcheck.org/2020/11/sharpie-ballots-count-in-arizona/
Arizona election officials say that voting with a Sharpie would have no impact on the votes being recorded by tabulation machines, and if there was an issue, there is a process that would keep the ballots from being canceled out.

https://recorder.maricopa.gov/site/faq.aspx


2、选举站工作人员把投特朗普的选票拿出来，扔掉。
FC: 伊利县选举委员会发布声明，确认拍摄“扔票视频”的男子“与伊利县没有任何关系，也没有参与过伊利县选举过程的任何部分。他甚至不在本地居住也不是注册选民。”
https://eriecountypa.gov/chair-of-election-board-issues-statement-following-false-election-claims-on-social-media/
https://www.factcheck.org/2020/11/bogus-posts-claim-poll-worker-tossed-ballots-in-pennsylvania/

3、4 请麻烦给出source方便FC

5、部分选举站拒绝观察员调查，用纸板封锁选举门窗。
FC: 费城官员否认共和党民意观察员被禁止监票
右翼媒体TheHill的报道
https://thehill.com/homenews/campaign/524289-philadelphia-officials-deny-gop-poll-watchers-banned-from-voting-sites

Feeley said the incident was the result of confusion over whether poll watchers were allowed to roam around the city or had to be assigned to a certain location. He said poll watchers can go to more than one location.

“The mistake was corrected, and the guy was admitted,” he told ProPublica.
